name: whale-analytics
description: Whale activity tracking, anomaly detection, and auto-daily snapshots for Telegram gift markets. Multi-source: GetGems + MarketApp sales + Giftstat price history + SQLite delta tracking.
author: Kloveren (t.me/morganlegacy)

tools.name: whale_tracker
tools.description: Track top gift holders (whales) — portfolios, buy/sell volumes, accumulation patterns, strategy classification. Multi-source: GetGems + MarketApp (optional). Auto-daily snapshots via scheduler.

tools.name: anomaly_detector
tools.description: Detect price and volume anomalies in gift markets — heuristic wash trading detection, price pump/dump, volume spikes. Statistical z-score analysis with configurable sensitivity.

tools.name: whale_snapshots
tools.description: Query stored whale snapshots + compute deltas between dates. Modes: latest (most recent), history (wallet timeline), compare (delta between two dates — who accumulated, who dumped, new entrants).
